Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1984, winning 2 games with a 1.80 ERA...
Injured on 5/27/1988 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 6/3/1991 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
